room_title: Escape room "Utopia" by Kuma Escape in San Jose
review: This game is technically the hardest level, with only about 5% success rate. I highly recommend a large party to participate in this stage because there are SO MANY PUZZLES. In terms of creativity, the puzzles are more trial and error, instead of methodical reasoning. Just keep trying, move fast, communicate and LISTEN!

room_title: Escape room "Utopia" by Kuma Escape in San Jose
review: We did Stage 2: Utopia and had a good time. I've done a different escape room with another company and it was too easy, Kuma was more challenging! Joseph and Sunny were really great "invisible men" and we enjoyed our experience more because of them.

room_title: Escape room "Utopia" by Kuma Escape in San Jose
review: We have attempted all 3 rooms and loved them all! Just tried Utopia and it was so much fun!! We were very close to finishing! Definitely get a good crew to come with you! We were made up of 4 teens and 3 adults and our varied experiences and skills made it so much fun!! Highly recommended and definitely worth it!

room_title: Escape room "Utopia" by Kuma Escape in San Jose
review: BEST GROUP ACTIVITY IN SAN JOSE SO FAR! If you think there is nothing to do in San Jose anymore, now there is something to do!Escaping a room in 1 hour, finding hints a riddles to figure out clues to escape the room!Great with friends and family! Team building exercise and just to escape!

room_title: Escape room "Utopia" by Kuma Escape in San Jose
review: Party of 8 all newbs and was sooooo close. Definitely has us all hooked and eager to try others! Awesome time for sure!
